level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2 [§ 2-501 et seq.], shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 20-207
level.text: Law 20-207, the “Public Space Enforcement Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-905. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 28, 2014, and Nov. 18, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 8, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-503 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-207 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.

level.heading: Editor’s notes
level.text: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-207: Section 12(a) of D.C. Law 20-207 provided that §§ 2(a), 2(b)(1), 2(b)(2)(A), 2(b)(2)(B), 2(b)(2)(C), 2(c), 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, and 11 shall apply as of March 11, 2015.
